guide.title: 2004.1 Feature Request List
guide.abstract: This guide is a List of all 2004.1 feature requests.

tr.ti: Stackable profile integration into Gentoo proper. Stackable profiles are inheritance based profiles that both reduce clutter and ease the management of profiles.
Bootable LiveCD for the Gentoo Hardnened project.
Cross compiling support built-in to Catalyst.

Automatic Portage security updates via Portage being called by using emerge security. This functionality will only download and update those packages that have been identified as vulnerable by a Gentoo GLSA.
Bootable X GameCD for Unreal Tournament 2004
GPG signing for Portage ebuilds. Specific files in the Portage tree will be signed by developer GPG keys to ensure tree integrity,
